org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent
Class AbstractHarvestAgent

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent.AbstractHarvestAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
HarvestAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
HarvestAgentHeritrix
public abstract class AbstractHarvestAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements HarvestAgent

The AbstractHarvestAgent implements the methods from HarvestAgent that can be implemented genericly for all Harvest Agent implementations.

Author:
nwaight
